Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory191.png'}
{3: "As Roland retreats under the four Gray Ravens' coordinated attack, the augmented reality around him begins to fade, pulling back the curtain."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Gray Ravens... More like Gray Cockroaches.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I thought you would die on that ghost ship, but now you're here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So you set up that rescue signal as a trap.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Indeed... But alas, I must bid thee farewell!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Get back here!', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're going to leave the Witch of the Sea behind just like that?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Witch of the Sea?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh, you mean Ide...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He turns around with a smile and looks at the motionless mechanoid lying on the ground.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The boring obsession of those three sisters should finally be over now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Three sisters?', 3: '20'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Forget it. It's nothing important.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "After all, only Ide was corrupted. As for the other two... Who knows, perhaps you've already met them somewhere?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Now that the administrator, Ide, has been taken care of, looks like you've achieved your goal of putting a stop to this facility."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Let's save the rest for the next time we chat.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He waves his hand and disappears in the blink of an eye.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, your chest... It's bleeding!", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's Lucia's vital fluid.", 3: '30'}
{3: 'Liv quickly runs over to Lucia and checks the crudely bandaged wound on her wrist.'}
{3: 'He looks at the prince costume and bites his tongue as if trying to stop himself from speaking his mind.'}
{2: "It's for tactical reasons...", 3: '37', 4: 'Just spit it out!', 5: '39'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Now that we're all here, let's go back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about the Corrupted at the bottom of the ocean?', 3: '43'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The situation has stabilized for the time being.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "As long as no one is commanding them, they won't attack ships as coordinated as before.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, let's move out.", 3: '48'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait, Commandant. Mind if I do something before we go?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory390.jpg'}
{3: 'The sea breeze blows through the ship, loosens your bow tie and carries it away—'}
{3: '—drawing your attention back to the island which is now "deserted."'}
{3: "Before departing, the team agrees to Lucia's proposal to use the central hub to order the Mini Bots into the sealed underground facility."}
{3: 'But even then, the Punishing Virus will turn them into Corrupted given enough time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We'll come back as soon as possible to restore this island back to its true glory. Ide...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She closes her eyes and listens to the whispers of the sea breeze. It seems to apprise the past and future of this island.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When that time comes... No one will need to make sacrifices or bear such an undertaking alone. Those who have lost their way will no longer be preyed upon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I promise.', 4: '1'}
